definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: A statement of the variations of forest from geological periods to historical periods of Zhejiang.
sentences.chinese: 历述浙江省从地史时期到历史时期森林的变迁情况。

sentences.english: Evolutionary process is of Sanjiang Basin geohistory rebuilt with numerical simulation technique.
sentences.chinese: 利用盆地数值模拟技术恢复了三江盆地地史演化过程。

definition: fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
succession (of changes in an ecological community)/naturally evolving sequence
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
Permian (geological period 292-250m years ago)/also written 二疊紀|二叠纪
third period/tertiary (geological era since the extinction of the dinosaurs at the Cretaceous-Tertiary boundary 65 million years ago)
